product.name: Doll
product.brief_description: Our Generation 70.31078 April 46 cm Fashion Doll, Auburn, 18 inch
product.p1: Available at a lower price from other sellers that may not offer free Prime delivery.
product.p2: Note: This item is eligible for FREE Click and Collect without a minimum order subject to availability.
product.p3: April loves fashion and her favourite season is winter
product.p4: She is an 46 cm non-poseable doll with long red hair and bright blue eyes
product.p5: Her favorite outfit is her brown tweed skirt with lace trim, her checkered top, knee high socks and her brown ballet flats because they match everything
product.p6: Her clothes have easy-open closures that make them quick and easy to put on and remove
product.p7: Solid plastic construction is durable, easy to clean, and free from BPA, phthalate, and lead
product.p8: Our Generation dolls and accessories are compatible with most 46 cm dolls
product.p10: Item dimensions L x W x H 24.1 x 12.7 x 50.8 centimetres
